title: What are some important Western and oriental philosophies that you can relate? Is it still vital to change? - Quora

response.answer_text: know yourself and you shall know the stars and heavens above. W e're all bent arrows out of the quiver, if we don't bend or flex mid-flight we will never hit our target. Looking ahead everything is a guess. Looking back and reflecting on the past at the difference between how things turned out and how we thought they were going to turn out that's where growth takes place. We dont change other things without changing our self's first. We changed inside first then it is reflected back to us in our environment.
Here's something on Descartes and Buddhism? "I think therefore I am." Is this a true statement or is there more to existence other than our thoughts?
